scenario.name: SIP_SUBSCRIBE_FROM_LIS
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> From: SENDER <sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 SUBSCRIBE Max-Forwards: 70 Event: presence Accept: application/pidf+xml Contact: sip:SENDER@[local_ip]:[local_port] Expires: 600 Content-Length: 0
